content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/delay-server is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. The project is located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/delay-server.

My approach will be:
1. First, explore the repository structure to understand what we're working with
2. Check the current Maven configuration (pom.xml)
3. Update the Java version to 17 in the pom.xml
4. Run `mvn clean verify` to see if there are any compatibility issues
5. Fix any issues that arise
6. Continue iterating until `mvn clean verify` passes

Let me start by exploring the repository structure.

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <parent>
        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
        <version>2.3.0.RELEASE</version>
        <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
    </parent>
    <groupId>com.winterchen</groupId>
    <artifactId>delay-server</artifactId>
    <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <name>delay-server</name>
    <description>Delay Server By RabbitMq</description>

    <properties>
	 <java.version>1.8</java.version>
	 <docker.image.prefix>winterchen</docker.image.prefix>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-amqp</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-validation</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-redis</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-pool2</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.squareup.okhttp3</groupId>
            <artifactId>okhttp</artifactId>
            <version>3.14.1</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
            <version>2.8.5</version>
        </dependency>


        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
            <exclusions>
                <exclusion>
                    <groupId>org.junit.vintage</groupId>
                    <artifactId>junit-vintage-engine</artifactId>
                </exclusion>
            </exclusions>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.amqp</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-rabbit-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <!-- <dependency>
            <groupId>com.winterchen</groupId>
            <artifactId>trace-spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
            <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
        </dependency> -->
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
	    </plugin>
		<!-- Docker maven plugin -->
			<plugin>
				<groupId>com.spotify</groupId>
				<artifactId>docker-maven-plugin</artifactId>
				<version>1.0.0</version>
				<configuration>
					<imageName>${docker.image.prefix}/${project.artifactId}</imageName>
					<dockerDirectory>src/main/docker</dockerDirectory>
                    
					<resources>
						<resource>
							<targetPath>/</targetPath>
							<directory>${project.build.directory}</directory>
							<include>${project.build.finalName}.jar</include>
						</resource>
					</resources>
				</configuration>
			</plugin>
			<!-- Docker maven plugin -->
        </plugins>
    </build>

</project>

        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
        <version>2.7.18</version>
        <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
    </parent>

Text replacement complete and details displayed in console.

Replaced 1 occurrence
Old string:     <properties>
	 <java.version>1.8</java.version>
	 <docker.image.prefix>winterchen</docker.image.prefix>
    </properties>
New string:     <properties>
	 <java.version>17</java.version>
	 <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
	 <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
	 <docker.image.prefix>winterchen</docker.image.prefix>
    </properties>

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <parent>
        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
        <version>2.7.18</version>
        <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
    </parent>
    <groupId>com.winterchen</groupId>
    <artifactId>delay-server</artifactId>
    <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <name>delay-server</name>
    <description>Delay Server By RabbitMq</description>

    <properties>
	 <java.version>17</java.version>
	 <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
	 <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
	 <docker.image.prefix>winterchen</docker.image.prefix>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-amqp</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-validation</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-redis</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-pool2</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.squareup.okhttp3</groupId>
            <artifactId>okhttp</artifactId>
            <version>4.12.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
            <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
            <version>2.10.1</version>
        </dependency>


        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
            <exclusions>
                <exclusion>
                    <groupId>org.junit.vintage</groupId>
                    <artifactId>junit-vintage-engine</artifactId>
                </exclusion>
            </exclusions>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.amqp</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-rabbit-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <!-- <dependency>
            <groupId>com.winterchen</groupId>
            <artifactId>trace-spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
            <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
        </dependency> -->
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
	    </plugin>
		<!-- Docker maven plugin -->
			<plugin>
				<groupId>com.spotify</groupId>
				<artifactId>docker-maven-plugin</artifactId>
				<version>1.0.0</version>
				<configuration>
					<imageName>${docker.image.prefix}/${project.artifactId}</imageName>
					<dockerDirectory>src/main/docker</dockerDirectory>
                    
					<resources>
						<resource>
							<targetPath>/</targetPath>
							<directory>${project.build.directory}</directory>
							<include>${project.build.finalName}.jar</include>
						</resource>
					</resources>
				</configuration>
			</plugin>
			<!-- Docker maven plugin -->
        </plugins>
    </build>

</project>

Perfect! The migration to Java 17 has been completed successfully. The `mvn clean verify` command passes without any errors.

## Summary of Changes

The Java 8 to Java 17 migration for the delay-server project has been completed successfully. Here are the key changes made:

### 1. **Updated pom.xml**:
   - **Spring Boot version**: Upgraded from 2.3.0.RELEASE to 2.7.18 (which fully supports Java 17)
   - **Java version**: Changed from 1.8 to 17
   - **Maven compiler properties**: Added explicit `maven.compiler.source` and `maven.compiler.target` set to 17
   - **OkHttp dependency**: Updated from 3.14.1 to 4.12.0 (compatible with Java 17)
   - **Gson dependency**: Updated from 2.8.5 to 2.10.1 (compatible with Java 17)

### 2. **Verification**:
   - All tests pass successfully
   - Application compiles with Java 17 bytecode (major version 61)
   - No code changes were required in the Java source files
   - The build completes successfully with `mvn clean verify`

The migration is complete and the project now runs on Java 17!
